base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Features four compartments on top, large front panel, and side handle. Compartments are evenly spaced, rectangular, and positioned at the top. The front panel is wide and flat, covering the main body.
internal_interaction_description: The top compartments are designed for storage, allowing items to be organized separately. The large front panel likely opens to reveal a larger storage area, accessible via the side handle, providing additional space for larger items.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, serving as a storage unit in homes or offices. It interacts with users who open the front panel via the handle to store or retrieve items, and its flat top may hold decorative objects.
